Articles.Content:
His name is Hazard-ish... how fitting.

[http://youtu.be/Nhk1BPQxoHE](https://youtu.be/Nhk1BPQxoHE)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-30T06:46:32Z" title="07/30/2015 06:46  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 30, 2015</time> by UnionPacific1983WP**

That's impressive ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Even Danny would be hard pressed to screw his universe so badly ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It may be akin to a great monsterous insult in these parts.. but that video made me laugh out loud and really enjoy it thankyou ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

said so because as much as danny's earlier videos were awesome it seemed as though the more recent ones seemed less adventerious than the earlier ones.. still enjoyable but not the same wow factor.. its great to see another join the party...

speaking of.. trains eh?.. its becoming like a virus ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) wonderful.. may it bring about Kerbal Train Simulator or Kerbal Space Train simulator eg.. galaxy railways in short order. clearly theres a market ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
it's a fun video but breaking the game by changing settings isnt that hard- doing it within the game is the hard part
He doesn't do those types of vids normally (Hazard-ish), but thankfully Danny's back!

I've watched pretty much all videos on his channel, they're all quite good. He's one of my go-to channels together with Danny and Scott Manley.

On a related note, who remembers the old tutorial videos by a guy with a super mellow voice who would always end with "I will see you out theeeeerreee".
Danny find actual bugs though. This guy created an artificial simulation.
I like his channel a lot. He does danny-style stuff, but also very demanding challenges. Someone who has been at Laythe and back with only SRBs deserves a lot more viewers.
